Text: If you don't have any .rar extracting software, you are going to need this.
If you are going to add the 2, make sure you do it before you install, I really don't think it's going to make any difference, but like I said, to be on the safe side.
Looks like everyone is pretty much happy with it. Any problems? Thanks for seeding, I know it didn't take too long, but still, thank-you.
By the way, I now have a 32 bit version up, so if you get the not compatible notice, then just download the other one, it's slightly different installation, I left instructions
